snippet: Marcel Kittel sprinted to victory in a wet second stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Michael Matthews took the overall leader’s pink jersey from his Orica-GreenEdge teammate Svein Tuft.
abstract: Marcel Kittel sprints to victory in a wet second stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Michael Matthews takes the overall leader’s pink jersey.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel sprinted to victory in a wet second stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Michael Matthews took the overall leader’s pink jersey from his Orica-GreenEdge teammate Svein Tuft.

headline.main: Kittel Wins and Matthews Leads in Giro
